name: タイピングVIPER
summary: Under pressure to improve your typing skills in real life, you find yourself dreaming every night about scenarios from various VIPER games in which proficient typing would be used to solve a particular problem. As your skills improve, the stages get progressively harder.
info:
• 平台: WIN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 2001-06-22
  • ブランド: ソニア
  • キャラクターデザイン: 柳沢 正秀
  • 原画: 小娘
